info.name: username
info.description: The username of the Sharepoint account.

info.name: password
info.description: The password of the Sharepoint account.

info.name: ms_project_location
info.description: The url for the homepage of the Microsoft Project location (ie. https://company.sharepoint.com/sites/pwa).

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
